body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' reading-body ')]

date: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' date-posted ')]

author: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' author ')]

test_url: https://thecreativeindependent.com/people/laurel-schwulst-my-website-is-a-shifting-house-next-to-a-river-of-knowledge-what-could-yours-be/
